mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO ass_sell_in_detail_Other ( group_id , hos_id , copy_code , sell_in_no , ass_id , ass_no , ass_ori_card_no , ass_brand , ass_spec , ass_model , fac_id , fac_no , price , add_depre , add_depre_month , cur_money , fore_money , note
) select t.* from(
select #{item.group_id} , #{item.hos_id} , #{item.copy_code} , #{item.sell_in_no} , #{item.ass_id} , #{item.ass_no} , #{item.ass_ori_card_no} , #{item.ass_brand}, null ass_brand,
#{item.ass_spec}, null ass_spec,
#{item.ass_model}, null ass_model,
#{item.fac_id}, null fac_id,
#{item.fac_no}, null fac_no,
#{item.price}, 0 price,
#{item.add_depre}, 0 add_depre,
#{item.add_depre_month}, null add_depre_month,
#{item.cur_money}, 0 cur_money,
#{item.fore_money}, 0 fore_money,
#{item.note} null note from dual
)t
mapper.select:
SELECT a.group_id, a.hos_id, a.copy_code, a.sell_in_no, a.ass_id, a.ass_no, b.ass_code, b.ass_name, a.ass_ori_card_no, a.ass_brand, a.ass_spec, a.ass_model, a.fac_id, a.fac_no, c.fac_code, c.fac_name, a.price, a.add_depre, a.add_depre_month, a.cur_money, a.fore_money, a.note FROM ASS_SELL_IN_DETAIL_Other a
left join ass_no_dict b on a.group_id = b.group_id and a.hos_id = b.hos_id and a.copy_code = b.copy_code and a.ass_id = b.ass_id and b.is_stop = 0 left join hos_fac_dict c on a.group_id = c.group_id and a.hos_id = c.hos_id and a.fac_id = c.fac_id and c.is_stop = 0 WHERE a.group_id = #{group_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and a.hos_id = #{hos_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and a.copy_code = #{copy_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and a.sell_in_no = #{sell_in_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT a.group_id, a.hos_id, a.copy_code, a.sell_in_no, a.ass_id, a.ass_no, b.ass_code, b.ass_name, a.ass_ori_card_no, a.ass_brand, a.ass_spec, a.ass_model, a.fac_id, a.fac_no, c.fac_code, c.fac_name, a.price, a.add_depre, a.add_depre_month, a.cur_money, a.fore_money, a.note FROM ASS_SELL_IN_DETAIL_Other a
left join ass_no_dict b on a.group_id = b.group_id and a.hos_id = b.hos_id and a.copy_code = b.copy_code and a.ass_id = b.ass_id and b.is_stop = 0 left join hos_fac_dict c on a.group_id = c.group_id and a.hos_id = c.hos_id and a.fac_id = c.fac_id and c.is_stop = 0 WHERE a.group_id = #{group_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and a.hos_id = #{hos_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and a.copy_code = #{copy_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and a.sell_in_no = #{sell_in_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and a.ass_id = #{ass_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and a.ass_no = #{ass_no,jdbcType=INTEGER} and a.ass_ori_card_no = #{ass_ori_card_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
